submit_an_application_to_contact: You can submit a request or contact us directly, and our specialists will answer all your questions!
follow_us: Follow our updates so you don't miss important events and announcements.
enter_code_phone: Enter the code sent to your phone
not_registered: You are not registered in the system
time_passed_actions: After the remaining time for order completion expires, your order will be canceled. The order can be paid using the methods below.
check_your_data: You might have entered incorrect data, please check and try again
processing_payment_get_tickets: Your payment is being processed. After successful payment, you will be able to receive the tickets
error_with_order: An error occurred while placing the order
no_tickets_sector: Unfortunately, tickets in this sector are sold out
placement_feeling: Here you can feel the full energy of the event, immerse yourself in the atmosphere, and be closer to the stage.
download_tickets_anytime: You can download your tickets at any time in the 'Order History'
successfully_order_tickets: You have successfully paid for the tickets! You can download your ticket below, which will be required at the event entrance.
enter_code_email: Enter the code sent to your email
no_category_message: We can't suggest any categories for you yet. Please try other categories or refresh the page later.
name: Name
no_recommendations_message: We can't offer you any recommendations yet. Try browsing other categories or refresh the page later.
enter_confirmation_code: Enter the confirmation code sent to your email
confirm_email_message: In order to purchase a ticket, you need to confirm your Email, to which the ticket will be sent
report_event_change: Notify of event cancellation, replacement or postponement
event_change_message: If your event is changed, cancelled, moved to another date or location, please let us know. We will notify all users who purchased tickets for this event about any changes and make the appropriate updates on the ProBilet website.
post_event_info: Post information about events on ProBilet.
partner_program_message: You can become an information partner of ProBilet. The partner program allows you to post information about events from your portal on ProBilet.
make_event_corrections: Make changes to the event or its location.
correction_request_message: To make corrections to the description of an event or place on ProBilet, please fill out the application. We will promptly make the necessary corrections.
support_service_message: If you have any questions about ProBilet, feel free to contact us. We are ready to help!
data_processing_agreement: Agreement on the processing of personal data
cookie_notice: This site uses cookies to store data.
cookie_consent_message: By continuing to use the site, you agree to work with these files.
add_tickets_message: Add tickets to your cart to continue shopping.
consent_to_data_processing: Consent to the Processing of Personal Data
user_consent: 1.1 I (hereinafter referred to as the User), using PROBILET.UZ Services through computers, mobile devices, or through websites, mobile applications, or optimized mobile websites (hereinafter referred to as the Service), owned by PROBILET LLC, TIN: 311327639 (hereinafter referred to as the Administration), in accordance with the Privacy Policy, user agreements for using the Service, and the license agreement, as well as ordering and using the Administration's services, in compliance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. ZRU-547 dated 02.07.2019 'On Personal Data,' voluntarily, of my own free will and in my own interest, provide the Administration with my specific, informed, and conscious consent to the processing of the following personal data, including biometric personal data:
surname_name: surname, first name; year, month, date, place of birth; gender;
phone_numbers: information about phone numbers, of which I am the subscriber and/or user;
email_usernames: information about my email addresses, online usernames, and data about the account created on the Service's website;
metadata: metadata, cookie data, cookie identifiers, IP addresses, browser and operating system information, HTTP headers, Device IP address, data collected by counters, technical characteristics of the Device and software, technical data about the Application's operation, including dates and times of use and access, identifiers of requested Application interface windows, geolocation data.
data_processing_consent: 1.2 As part of the provided consent, I grant the Administration the right to perform any actions with my personal data, including but not limited to: collection, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (update, modification), use, transfer, anonymization, blocking, destruction, transmission, including cross-border, of personal data to the Administration's partners, the list of which is provided on the Administration's website at https://www.probilet.uz, as well as carrying out other necessary actions with personal data in accordance with current legislation.
consent_duration: 1.3 This consent is granted by me for the duration of the license agreement, user agreement, or any other agreement for using the Service or any other agreement with the Administration.
consent_purpose_technical_support: 1.4 This consent is provided by me for the purposes of providing technical or other support when using the Service or purchasing goods/services from the Administration, as well as for the following purposes:
contract_negotiation: consideration by the Administration of the possibility of concluding any contracts and agreements with me, decision-making regarding the offer of products and services, agreement on the terms of such contracts and agreements with the Administration, concluding contracts and agreements with the Administration, using the Administration's services;
data_verification: verification of the accuracy of the information I provided, obtaining my personal data from other permitted sources;
service_quality_improvement: improvement of the quality of services provided by the Administration, organization of improvements to the Administration's software, including the Service;
data_system_creation: creation of data information systems, analysis, modeling, forecasting, building mathematical models, building scoring models, using them, and transferring the results of information processing to third parties, analysis of aggregated and anonymized data, statistical and research purposes;
debt_recovery: collection of overdue debts owed to the Administration under any contract or agreement;
document_storage_services: provision of document storage services to the Administration by third-party organizations, including creating, storing, transferring electronic copies of these documents, and recognizing scanned images of these documents;
product_promotion: promotion of the Administration's products and services, including transmitting information and advertising messages about the Administration's services through direct contacts using communication means, including telephone communication, mobile radio telephone network, chat, SMS messages, instant messaging services, emails, push notifications, conducting promotional events, including lotteries, contests, games, and other advertising campaigns organized by the Administration;
reward_programs: registration in reward programs (bonus programs) or other programs conducted by the Administration or organizations cooperating with the Administration, and the implementation of such programs;
other_purposes: other purposes that will be specified in the contracts and agreements concluded between me and the Administration.
data_processing_methods: 1.5 Processing of my personal data is allowed using the following main methods (but not limited to): storage, recording on electronic media and their storage, compilation of lists, labeling.
data_processing_automation: 1.6 Processing of my personal data is allowed both with and without the use of automation tools in accordance with current legislation.
dpm_systems: 1.7 Processing of my personal data is allowed using DPM (Data Protection Manager) systems, including those owned by third parties and provided to the Administration under a relevant contract or agreement, provided that measures to protect the confidentiality of personal data are observed.
data_transmission: 1.8 This consent to the processing of my personal data applies to any transfer of my personal data to the Administration made before providing this consent.
signature: 1.9 This consent is signed by my simple electronic signature, the use of which is established by the user agreement for using the Service, accepted at the time of my registration in the Service.
withdrawal_notice: 1.10 I am informed that the consent to the processing of personal data can be withdrawn by me by sending a corresponding request, signed with a simple electronic signature, to the email address info@probilet.uz.
automatic_restriction: 1.11 I am informed that the withdrawal of consent to the processing of such personal data as surname, first name, and email address will automatically deprive me of the right to use the Service.
legal_continuation: 1.12 I am informed that in the event of my withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data, the Administration has the right to continue processing my personal data without my consent if there are grounds established by law.
data_deletion: 1.13 I am informed that in the event of my withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data, the Administration will stop processing or ensure the cessation of such processing (if the processing of personal data is carried out by another party acting on behalf of the Administration) and, if the retention of personal data is no longer required for the purposes of processing personal data, destroy or ensure the destruction of personal data within a period not exceeding 30 (thirty) working days from the date of receipt of such withdrawal.
